sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>alcohol</radical> you take a <radical>measurement</radical> most carefully of is <kanji>sake</kanji>. Sake is very important to the alcohol culture in Japan, so you must make sure to measure it out to the precise amount.
meaningInfo: Imagine this sake as you measure it out. Hear it pouring out of the bottle as you catch the whiff of sweet alcohol in the air.
readingMnemonic: You know who enjoyed <kanji>sake</kanji> a lot? <reading>Chew</reading>bacca (<ja>ちゅう</ja>). He was always drinking, which is concerning when you think about all the driving he did.
readingInfo: Imagine Chewbacca drinking sake all the time while Han Solo told him he needed to stop and get help, but Chewbacca just did his yell thing and drank more sake.
